text.section: The department and the board shall have authority to promulgate and adopt rules and regulations consistent with KRS 251.410, 251.430, 251.440, 251.451, 251.490, and 251.600 to 251.740.

Nothing contained herein shall limit the authority of the Commissioner to take disciplinary action against any licensed grain dealer or warehouseman for a violation of KRS 251.410, 251.430, 251.440, 251.451, 251.490, and 251.600 to 251.740, or the rules and regulations of the department, nor shall the repayment in full of all obligations to the Kentucky grain insurance fund by any licensed grain dealer or warehouseman nullify or modify the effect of any other disciplinary proceeding brought pursuant to KRS 251.410, 251.430, 251.440, 251.451, 251.490, and 251.600 to 251.740.

law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 389, sec. 11, effective July 13, 1984.
